hero.title: Ana Julia Mazon is a web designer and full-stack developer
hero.description: I craft responsive websites where technologies meet creativity

quote.text: With great power comes great electricity bill
quote.author: Dr. Who

about.title: about
description: I’m a self-taught full-stack developer live in Curitiba, Brazil. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and raise them into modern user-friendly web experiences.

Transforming my creativity and knowledge into websites has been my passion for over two years. I have helped several clients establish their online presence. I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me
